name: Bomballed
description:
I made this game in Phaser 3 in two days. It's a wonderful experience. The Phaser documentation is quite overwhelming but yes it helped me understand things better.

I hope you all will enjoy playing this as well!

As always I will be waiting for your feedback.

This project is available on github here.

Asset attributions:

  1. Explosion
  2. Sky
  3. Manaspace Font
